mapper.insert: insert into companycaroption (ccar_car_id, car_code, com_id, ccar_use_yn, ccar_blackbox_yn, ccar_smoke_yn, ccar_rear_camera_yn, ccar_rear_sence_yn, ccar_navi_yn, ccar_sun_roof_yn, ccar_bluetooth_yn, ccar_aux_yn, ccar_smartkey_yn, ccar_rentalcount, ccar_normal_price, ccar_weekend_price, ccar_peak_price, ccar_s_peak_price, ccar_arrear, comcar_regdate) values( #{ccarCarId},#{carCode}, #{comId}, #{ccarUseYn}, #{ccarBlackboxYn}, #{ccarSmokeYn}, #{ccarRearCameraYn}, #{ccarRearSenceYn}, #{ccarNaviYn}, #{ccarSunRoofYn}, #{ccarBluetoothYn}, #{ccarAuxYn}, #{ccarSmartkeyYn}, #{ccarRentalcount}, #{ccarNormalPrice}, #{ccarWeekendPrice}, #{ccarPeakPrice}, #{ccarSPeakPrice}, #{ccarArrear}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from companycaroption where comcar_outdate is null
select c.*, cco.* from car c right join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.comcar_outdate is null
select c.*, cco.* from car c right join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.ccar_car_id=#{cco.ccar_car_id}

select * from ( select rownum as RNUM, LIST.* from ( select c.car_name, c.car_inc, c.car_fuel, c.car_size, c.car_year, c.car_trans, c.car_type, cco.* from car c join companycaroption cco on c.car_code = cco.car_code where cco.com_id='rentGo' order by cco.comcar_regdate desc )LIST )
where RNUM>#{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM <=#{firstRecordIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.update: update companycaroption set ccar_car_id=#{ccarCarId}, ccar_use_yn=#{ccarUseYn},ccar_blackbox_yn=#{ccarBlackboxYn}, ccar_rear_camera_yn=#{ccarRearCameraYn}, ccar_rear_sence_yn=#{ccarRearSence},ccar_navi_yn=#{ccarNaviYn},ccar_sun_roof_yn=#{ccarSunRoofYn},ccar_bluetooth_yn=#{ccarBluetoothYn}, ccar_aux_yn=#{ccarAuxYn},ccar_smartkey_yn=#{ccarSmartKeyYn}, ccar_normal_price= #{ccarNormalPrice}, ccar_weekend_price= #{ccarWeekendPrice}, ccar_peak_price= #{ccarPeakPrice}, ccar_s_peak_price= #{ccarSPeakPrice} where com_id = #{comId} and ccar_car_id=#{ccarCarId}
